excerpt.rendered:
Inspired by the dusk of an autumn evening in the Scottish Highlands and the captivating firelight glowing through the windows of Easter Elchies House, Easter Elchies Black 2020 Release is a distinctively smoky and full-bodied expression influenced by The Macallan’s heritage and craft.
The third and final release in the limited annual series of smoky style, higher strength single malt whiskies, Easter Elchies Black 2020 Release has an ABV of 50% and displays a natural colour of autumn chestnut.
It imparts aromas of smoked toffee, orange, raisin and oak spice, flavours of warming ginger and cinnamon, polished oak and smoked orange peel and has a distinctively sweet and smoky finish.

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
Age : NAS
Vintage : 
ABV : 50.00%
